name: The Escape
summary:
"The Escape is a challenging online co-op strategy game where players work together to complete a series of tasks and levels and go head-to-head in our two game modes known as The Escape and Hide and Seek. 
 
If you like to take life on the creative edge; we have an in-game level editor with workshop capability so you can host and share your levels with your friends and other players around the world! 
 
The controls are simple and the game is designed for the user to be able to host or join a game within a few seconds. 
Worried about server issues? Don't worry, you can host lobbies from the comfort of your own home to match against your friends quickly and easily."
